alerts.title: Montlake Bridge
alerts.desc: Both lanes of traffic on the Montlake Bridge closed from 10 a.m. - 4 p.m. for the opening day of boating season.

alerts.title: 140th Way SE
alerts.street: 140th Way SE from SE Fairwood Boulevard to Renton City Limit
alerts.desc: Guardrail maintenance requiring a lane restriction. Work is scheduled to take place weekdays beginning Friday, May 3 through Friday, May 17, from 7 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Motorists will be directed through the work zone and should expect delays. The schedule for this work is subject to frequent change. Check back often for the latest information. https://bit.ly/2XwjQVT

alerts.title: 4th Avenue SW
alerts.street: 4th Avenue SW between SW Roxbury Street and SW 100th Street
alerts.desc: A King County Housing Authority Project to improve drainage systems and add sidewalks, crosswalks and on-street parking on 4th Avenue SW in the Greenbridge Community between SW 100th Street and SW Roxbury Street. The work requires a full 24/7 road closure from Monday, April 29 to Monday, June 3. A detour will direct motorists to 8th Avenue SW and SW Roxbury Street, but alternate routes are available including 16th Avenue SW and Myers Way S.

alerts.title: 232nd Pl SW
alerts.street: 232nd Pl SW from SR 104 to 89th Ave W

alerts.title: Tualco Road
alerts.desc: Riley Slough Bridge closure due to construction/maintenance
